alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Juneau (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 12 at 4:16AM AKST until December 13 at 3:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 3 AM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...City and Borough of Juneau. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 3 AM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...High winds will blow around unsecured objects, damage property and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest wind gusts will occur beginning during the early evening hours on Tuesday.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure vessels and loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind. Report any damage to the National Weather Service by visiting weather.gov/Juneau/StormReports
